trans-unit.source: Defines a particular format for text, including font face, size, and style attributes.
trans-unit.target: 定義文字的特定格式，包括字體、大小和樣式屬性 (Attribute)。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to construct fonts, see [How to: Construct Font Families and Fonts](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-construct-font-families-and-fonts.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何建構字型的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 建構字型系列和字型](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-construct-font-families-and-fonts.md)。

trans-unit.source: Windows Forms applications support TrueType fonts and have limited support for OpenType fonts.
trans-unit.target: Windows Form 應用程式支援 TrueType 字型，而且具有有限的 OpenType 字型支援。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to use a font that is not supported, or the font is not installed on the machine that is running the application, the Microsoft Sans Serif font will be substituted.
trans-unit.target: 如果您嘗試使用不支援字型或字型未安裝在執行應用程式的電腦上，將會取代 Microsoft Sans Serif 字型。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Font.%23ctor%2A> constructor and the <xref:System.Drawing.Font.Size%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Font.SizeInPoints%2A>, and <xref:System.Drawing.Font.Unit%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Drawing.Font.%23ctor%2A>建構函式和<xref:System.Drawing.Font.Size%2A>， <xref:System.Drawing.Font.SizeInPoints%2A>，和<xref:System.Drawing.Font.Unit%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with a Windows Form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> named `ComboBox1` that is populated with the strings "Bigger" and "Smaller" and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label> named `Label1`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例為了搭配 Windows Form 包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>名為`ComboBox1`，會填入字串 「 大於 」 和 「 小 」 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label>名為`Label1`。

trans-unit.target: 將下列程式碼貼到表單，並將關聯`ComboBox1_SelectedIndexChanged`方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndexChanged>事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>控制項。

trans-unit.target: 初始化使用指定之現有 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> 與 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.FontStyle" /> 的新 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />。

trans-unit.target: 用來建立新 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> 的現有 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />。

trans-unit.target: 要套用至新 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.FontStyle" />。

trans-unit.source: Multiple values of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.FontStyle" /> enumeration can be combined with the <see langword="OR" /> operator.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.FontStyle" /> 列舉的多個值可以與 <see langword="OR" /> 運算子相結合。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> that uses the specified existing <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> and <see cref="T:System.Drawing.FontStyle" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 初始化使用指定之現有 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> 與 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.FontStyle" /> 列舉的新 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />。

trans-unit.source: For localized applications that are based on the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] and earlier releases, specifying a font for `prototype` when that font has not been installed on the computer that is used to build your application will cause the Microsoft Sans Serif font to be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 當地語系化的應用程式為基礎的[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]和舊版本中，指定的字型`prototype`當該字型尚未安裝用來建置您的應用程式的電腦上，將導致要使用的 Microsoft Sans Serif 字型改為。

trans-unit.source: If your application depends on this behavior and you must recompile your application for the .NET Framework 3.0, you should specify the Microsoft Sans Serif font for `prototype`.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個行為取決於您的應用程式，您必須重新編譯您的應用程式的.NET Framework 3.0，您應該指定的 Microsoft Sans Serif 字型`prototype`。

trans-unit.source: The code clones a <xref:System.Drawing.Font> and draws text with that font.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼複製品<xref:System.Drawing.Font>和繪製文字的字型。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />.
trans-unit.target: 釋放此 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> 所使用的所有資源。

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.Drawing.Font.Dispose%2A> allows the resources used by this <xref:System.Drawing.Font> to be reallocated for other purposes.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Font.Dispose%2A>允許所使用的資源<xref:System.Drawing.Font>都重新配置用於其他用途。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Drawing.Font.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.Drawing.Font>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Font.Dispose%2A> 使用完畢時，請呼叫 <xref:System.Drawing.Font>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Font.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.Drawing.Font> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Font.Dispose%2A> 方法會將 <xref:System.Drawing.Font> 保留在無法使用的狀態。

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.Drawing.Font.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Drawing.Font> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Drawing.Font> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫<xref:System.Drawing.Font.Dispose%2A>，您必須釋放所有參考<xref:System.Drawing.Font>讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的<xref:System.Drawing.Font>所佔用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.Drawing.Font.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Drawing.Font>.
trans-unit.target: 在您釋放最後一個 <xref:System.Drawing.Font.Dispose%2A> 參考之前，請務必呼叫 <xref:System.Drawing.Font>。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Font> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 <xref:System.Drawing.Font> 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。

trans-unit.source: A [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] `LOGFONT`, or logical font, is a structure that contains 14 properties that describe a particular font.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see "The Logical Font" in the Windows Development documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <"的邏輯字型 」 中的 Windows 開發文件[ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library)。

trans-unit.source: The font is not a TrueType font.
trans-unit.target: 字型不是 TrueType 字型。

trans-unit.source: for access to unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 用於存取 unmanaged 程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Related enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 相關的列舉： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: Gets a byte value that specifies the GDI character set that this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> uses.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> 使用之 GDI 字元集的位元組值。

trans-unit.source: A byte value that specifies the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] character set that this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> uses.
trans-unit.target: 位元組值，指定這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> 使用的 [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] 字元集。

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: 預設為 1。

trans-unit.source: This property returns 1, unless a different character set is specified in the <xref:System.Drawing.Font.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Single%2CSystem.Drawing.FontStyle%2CSystem.Drawing.GraphicsUnit%2CSystem.Byte%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會傳回 1，除非指定不同的字元集<xref:System.Drawing.Font.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Single%2CSystem.Drawing.FontStyle%2CSystem.Drawing.GraphicsUnit%2CSystem.Byte%29>建構函式。

trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會使用 Windows SDK 的標頭檔 WinGDI.h 中定義之清單中的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> is derived from a GDI vertical font.
trans-unit.target: 取得布林值，指示這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> 是否衍生自 GDI 垂直字型。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> is derived from a [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] vertical font; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> 衍生自 [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] 垂直字型，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to determine if a font is compatible with native Win32 controls on non-Unicode platforms.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性來判斷是否與非 Unicode 平台上的原生 Win32 控制項的字型。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Font.GdiVerticalFont%2A> only returns `true` if this font was created from a classic GDI
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Font.GdiVerticalFont%2A> 只會傳回`true`如果從傳統 GDI 建立這種字型

trans-unit.source: font definition, like a LOGFONT or HFONT.
trans-unit.target: 字型定義，例如 LOGFONT 或 HFONT。

trans-unit.source: The code performs the following actions:
trans-unit.target: 該程式碼執行下列動作：

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.Drawing.Font>.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <xref:System.Drawing.Font>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the hash code for that font.
trans-unit.target: 取得字型的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: Displays a message box with the value of the hash code.
trans-unit.target: 顯示訊息方塊具有值的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: Returns the line spacing of this font.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個字型的行距。

trans-unit.source: Returns the line spacing, in pixels, of this font.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個字型的行距 (單位為像素)。

trans-unit.source: The line spacing, in pixels, of this font.
trans-unit.target: 這個字型的行距 (單位為像素)。

trans-unit.source: The line spacing of a <xref:System.Drawing.Font> is the vertical distance between the base lines of two consecutive lines of text.
trans-unit.target: 行距<xref:System.Drawing.Font>是兩連續文字行基準線間的垂直距離。

trans-unit.source: Thus, the line spacing includes the blank space between lines along with the height of the character itself.
trans-unit.target: 因此，行距包含以及字元本身的高度行間的空白空間。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Drawing.Font.Unit%2A> property of the font is set to anything other than <xref:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit.Pixel?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the height (in pixels) is calculated using the vertical resolution of the screen display.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Drawing.Font.Unit%2A>以外之字型的屬性設定為任何項目<xref:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit.Pixel?displayProperty=nameWithType>，使用在螢幕上顯示的垂直解析度計算的高度 （以像素為單位）。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose the font unit is inches and the font size is 0.3.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假設字型單位是英吋，並將字型大小為 0.3。

trans-unit.source: Also suppose that for the corresponding font family, the em-height is 2048 and the line spacing is 2355.
trans-unit.target: 也假設對應的字型系列，其 em 高度為 2048年，行距是 2355年。

trans-unit.source: For a screen display that has a vertical resolution of 96 dots per inch, you can calculate the height as follows:
trans-unit.target: 螢幕顯示的垂直解析度為 96 dpi，您可以計算高度，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> that holds the vertical resolution, in dots per inch, of the display device as well as settings for page unit and page scale.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />，其保留顯示裝置的垂直解析度 (單位為 DPI) 以及頁面單位和頁面縮放的設定。

trans-unit.source: Returns the line spacing, in the current unit of a specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />, of this font.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個字型的行距 (單位是指定之 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 的目前單位)。

trans-unit.source: The line spacing, in pixels, of this font.
trans-unit.target: 這個字型的行距 (單位為像素)。

trans-unit.source: The line spacing of a <xref:System.Drawing.Font> is the vertical distance between the base lines of two consecutive lines of text.

trans-unit.source: Thus, the line spacing includes the blank space between lines along with the height of the character itself.
trans-unit.target: 因此，行距包含以及字元本身的高度行間的空白空間。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Drawing.Font.Unit%2A> property of the font is set to anything other than <xref:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit.Pixel?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the height, in pixels, is calculated using the vertical resolution of the specified <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Drawing.Font.Unit%2A>以外之字型的屬性設定為任何項目<xref:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit.Pixel?displayProperty=nameWithType>，使用指定的垂直解析度導出高度，單位為像素<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>物件。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose the font unit is inches and the font size is 0.3.

trans-unit.source: Also suppose that for the corresponding font family, the em-height is 2048 and the line spacing is 2355.
trans-unit.target: 也假設對應的字型系列，其 em 高度為 2048年，行距是 2355年。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object has a <xref:System.Drawing.Font.Unit%2A> property value of <xref:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit.Pixel?displayProperty=nameWithType> and a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DpiY%2A> property value of 96 dots per inch, the height is calculated as follows:

trans-unit.target: 繼續進行相同的範例，假設<xref:System.Drawing.Font.Unit%2A>屬性<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>物件設定為<xref:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit.Millimeter?displayProperty=nameWithType>而不是<xref:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit.Pixel?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Then (using 1 inch = 25.4 millimeters) the height, in millimeters, is calculated as follows:

trans-unit.source: The value returned by the <xref:System.Drawing.Font.GetHeight%2A> method would be 33.11719, and the value returned by the <xref:System.Drawing.Font.Height%2A> property would be 34.
trans-unit.target: 所傳回的值<xref:System.Drawing.Font.GetHeight%2A>方法，可 33.11719，和所傳回的值<xref:System.Drawing.Font.Height%2A>屬性應為 34。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Font.Height%2A> property is the value returned by <xref:System.Drawing.Font.GetHeight%2A>, rounded up to the nearest integer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Font.Height%2A>屬性是所傳回的值<xref:System.Drawing.Font.GetHeight%2A>，四捨五入到最接近的整數。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the font is a member of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SystemFonts" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指示字型是否為 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SystemFonts" /> 的成員。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the font is a member of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SystemFonts" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果字型是 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SystemFonts" /> 的成員，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When the user changes the system font, the <xref:System.Drawing.Font.IsSystemFont%2A> property could return `true`, even if the font is not actually a system font.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者變更，為系統字型<xref:System.Drawing.Font.IsSystemFont%2A>屬性無法傳回`true`，即使的字型不是實際系統字型。

trans-unit.source: To avoid this situation, if you are using system fonts in your application, you should track user preference changes by handling the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.SystemEvents.UserPreferenceChanging> or <xref:Microsoft.Win32.SystemEvents.UserPreferenceChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免此情況下，，如果您使用系統字型應用程式中，您應該追蹤使用者喜好設定變更處理<xref:Microsoft.Win32.SystemEvents.UserPreferenceChanging>或<xref:Microsoft.Win32.SystemEvents.UserPreferenceChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this font has the italic style applied.

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with a Windows Form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> named `ComboBox1` that is populated with the strings "Bigger" and "Smaller".
trans-unit.target: 這個範例為了搭配 Windows Form 包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>名為`ComboBox1`，會填入字串 「 大於 」 和 「 小 」。

trans-unit.source: Paste the following code into the form and associate the `ComboBox1_SelectedIndexChanged` method with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndexChanged> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 將下列程式碼貼到表單，並將關聯`ComboBox1_SelectedIndexChanged`方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox.SelectedIndexChanged>事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the font originally specified.

trans-unit.source: The actual font name and original font name can be different.
trans-unit.target: 原始的字型名稱與實際的字型名稱可能會不同。

trans-unit.source: System requirements may cause the use of a font other than the font originally specified.
trans-unit.target: 系統需求，可能會導致使用非原本指定之字型的字型。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Font.%23ctor%2A> constructor and the <xref:System.Drawing.Font.Size%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Font.SizeInPoints%2A>, and <xref:System.Drawing.Font.Unit%2A> properties.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the system font if the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Font.IsSystemFont" /> property returns <see langword="true" />.
